title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7633.7 - Waste disposal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7633.7 - Waste disposal

State Regulations

The department shall ensure that each facility provide for
waste disposal which protects the health and safety of prisoners and staff and
complies with all applicable laws and codes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7633.7

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
